name: Cyclotone 4.5
description:
Sequence from an ongoing, and continually evolving, audiovisual work [2012-2021]. Performed at Mutek, Elektra, Ars Electronica and Resonate among other electronic music and arts festivals.

This video → Nov 2021 / Sound:ON

'A work of flickering beauty, inspired by Russian cosmonauts, Constructivist-minded artists, and four-dimensional space, cross-wiring sound and video to deliver a deluge of mesmerizing, floor-to-ceiling, multi-modal synchronisations' – Mutek, 2017.
